ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Robes  a bit of a spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: If what you want is a different robe, then here is a list for you.  Someone a while back posted a list of the different robe colors and where they can be
ygData.messageBody:
If what you want is a different robe, then here is a list for you. Someone
a while back posted a list of the different robe colors and where they can
be found. The apprentice robes you can purchase in the wizard guilds,
mostly. The gnome yellow one is race specific, but I haven't found the
others to be. A couple are class specific (like the black one for necros in
Neriak).

Black Flowing Robe Najena
Blue Robe Erudin, Qeynos
Brown/orange Robe Thaumaturgist Robe (befallen)
Dingy White Robe Damask (befallen)
Green Robe Felwithe
Red Robe Erudin
Violet Robe Freeport
White Robe Gossimer (befallen)
Yellow Robe Ak'anon (Though I think only gnomes can ware
them).







> I will post the results here sometime later this week I hope..
>
> Are there any other nice robes available for my lvl (12)? Appearence is
> important for my character.. :-)
>
> file://Shulinar, high elf wizard (lvl 12), Rodcet nife.
>
> --
> Disclaimer: Any errors in spelling, tact, or fact are transmission errors.
> | Mattias Bergander aka Pulsar |
